ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Stones on E'ci
ygData.msgSnippet: Join a group in Rathe  Mts and kill hg s. (If your char is not of a level sufficient to join a hg group, then just hang out there while the group does the
ygData.messageBody:
Join a group in Rathe Mts and kill hg's. (If your char is not of a level
sufficient to join a hg group, then just hang out there while the group does
the killing.)

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 38th song
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Roach [mailto:mike.roach@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 9:35 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Lambent Stones on E'ci

From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>

I have a problem with obtaining lambent stones.


Does anyone have any suggestions or recommendations apart
from soloing in
the Rathe mts and charming giants to kill each other?

-Faras
